I try, I fail so I ask.

And Rs woodcut, I honestly did not know that, I’ll remove it.

I just copied this same post and posted on numerous sites that don’t have rules like that.
[/quote]
No, you didn’t do anything wrong.[/quote]Guess you can’t read.

@rs_w00dcut wrote:

My source is FunScap3, except it is HIGHLY edited. Managed to remove over 300KB of junk.

If you need my client.java or any other files, PM me (I’m not posting it in public).


Lmao,Highly edited funscap3…
Also remove "if you need my client.Java pm me’
i reported for that,No posting command prompt items/client.javas/item.javas,or accepting links in pm

item.title: My Thread of Questions - Think your so good? Lets find out
item.dc:creator: @krixus krixus
item.description:
@krixus wrote:

Question 1

I have this:

FIXED

Question 2

FIXED

Question 3

K, I have this:

[code]{
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players)
{
client person = (client)p;
if(p != null && person != null)
{
if(p != null && person != null)
{
if ((p.absX >=2590 && p.absX <=2579 && p.absY >=3919 && p.absY <=3905) && person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) >= 10000 || person.heightLevel != npcs[i].heightLevel)
if (npcs[i].npcType == 3406 || npcs[i].npcType == 3406)
{
npcs[i].RandomWalk = true;
}
}
}
}

for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players)
{
client person = (client)p;
if(p != null && person != null)
{
if(p != null && person != null)
{
if ((p.absX >=2579 && p.absX <=2590 && p.absY >=3905 && p.absY <=3919) && person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) <= 10 && person.heightLevel == npcs[i].heightLevel)
if (npcs[i].npcType == 3406 || npcs[i].npcType == 3406)
{
npcs[i].StartKilling = person.playerId;
npcs[i].RandomWalk = false;
npcs[i].IsUnderAttack = true;
}
}
}
}
}[/code]

I was hoping that they’d only attack within the area i put in there.

But they attack everywhere.

If i go through a portal, they’ll walk over the water and everything until they get to me.

Is there something I forgot to add?

That is all.

Read full topic
